anxiety.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ
anxiety.transliteration: Allāhumma innī a'ūdhu bika min al-hammi wa'l-ḥazan, wa a'ūdhu bika min al-'ajzi wa'l-kasal
anxiety.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow, weakness and laziness.

gratitude.translation: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.

protection.arabic: أُعِيذُكُمَا بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَامَّةٍ
protection.transliteration: U'īdhukumā bi-kalimāti'llāhi't-tāmmati min kulli shayṭānin wa hāmmatin wa min kulli 'aynin lāmmatin
protection.translation: I seek protection for you from the perfect words of Allah against every devil and poisonous creature, and against every evil eye.

forgiveness.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
forgiveness.translation: O Allah, You are the Pardoner, You love to pardon, so pardon me.

guidance.translation: O Allah, guide me among those You have guided.

morning.arabic: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
morning.transliteration: Aṣbaḥnā wa aṣbaḥa'l-mulku lillāh, wa'l-ḥamdu lillāh
morning.translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time unto Allah belongs all sovereignty, and all praise is for Allah.

sickness.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ النَّاسِ أَذْهِبِ الْبَاسَ، اشْفِهِ وَأَنْتَ الشَّافِي
sickness.transliteration: Allāhumma rabba'n-nāsi adhhibi'l-ba's, ishfihi wa anta'sh-shāfī
sickness.translation: O Allah, Lord of the people! Remove the trouble and heal him, You are the Healer.

entering_home.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
entering_home.transliteration: Bismi'llāhi walajna, wa bismi'llāhi kharajna, wa 'alā'llāhi rabbinā tawakkalnā
entering_home.translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon Allah, our Lord, we place our trust.

entering_toilet.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
entering_toilet.transliteration: Allāhumma innī a'ūdhu bika min al-khubuthi wa'l-khabā'ith
entering_toilet.translation: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.

waking_up.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
waking_up.transliteration: Lā ilāha illa'llāhu waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, lahu'l-mulku wa lahu'l-ḥamdu wa huwa 'alā kulli shay'in qadīr
waking_up.translation: There is no deity except Allah, alone without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things competent.

sadness.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي عَبْدُكَ، ابْنُ عَبْدِكَ، ابْنُ أَمَتِكَ، نَاصِيَتِي بِيَدِكَ
sadness.transliteration: Allāhumma innī 'abduka, ibnu 'abdika, ibnu amatika, nāṣiyatī biyadik
sadness.translation: O Allah, I am Your servant, son of Your servant, son of Your maidservant, my forelock is in Your hand.

dailyDua.translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
